item.title: Need a bit of help with FindColorTolerance
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Thanks.
How can I make the FindColorTolerance into an if, then statement.
e.g if(findcolortolerance(blahhh) is true) then
clickmouse blaahh

also,
wait(5000+random(2000);
gives me an error (comma expected)

Read full topic
item.source: Need a bit of help with FindColorTolerance

item.title: Need a bit of help with FindColorTolerance
item.dc:creator: @endr1x endr1x
item.description:
@endr1x wrote:

you need to have FindColorTolerance(x, y, 7194247, 99, 737, 12, 753, 15);

since it stores where it finds the colour at x,y.

There were a few other errors that i’ve corrected:

program DraynorWoodCutter;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
//--------------------------------------------Variables
//var FindClient: Integer; already in srl
var count: Integer;
//--------------------------------------------Tracking
Procedure track;
begin
     if(count = 1)then
     writeln('Banked 1 time');
end;
//--------------------------------------------Main Process
procedure process;
begin
     Wait(2000);
     ClickMouse(652, 184, true);
     Wait(2000);
     ClickMouse(623, 119, true);
     Wait(15000);
     FindColorTolerance(x, y , 7194247, 99, 737, 12, 753, 15);
end;
//--------------------------------------------Clear Shortcut
procedure c;
begin
     ClearDebug
end;
//--------------------------------------------Activate client
procedure clientfind;
begin
     ActivateClient;
     c;
     Writeln ('Client Identified');
end;
//--------------------------------------------Initiate
begin
     clientfind;
     process;
end.

A few tips: use Srls’ Mouse(x,y,1,1,true);
add random to your waits wait(5000+random(2000);

Read full topic
item.source: Need a bit of help with FindColorTolerance

item.title: Need a bit of help with FindColorTolerance
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hey. I kinda need some help with FindColorTolerance, every example I find gives me errors. Can someone help me out? Heres my script, its pretty small. It would be much bigger, but I’m not gona continue on with something that gives me errors when its this small. The track procedure I’m just expirimenting with. At the end of process procedure its gona do track = +1; or something. I still gotta work out some stuff.

program DraynorWoodCutter; //--------------------------------------------Variables var FindClient: Integer; var count: Integer; //--------------------------------------------Tracking Procedure track; begin if(count = 1)then writeln('Banked 1 time'); end; //--------------------------------------------Main Process procedure process; begin Wait(2000); ClickMouse(652, 184, true); Wait(2000); ClickMouse(623, 119, true); Wait(15000); FindColorTolerance(440, 384 , 7194247, 99, 737, 12, 753, 15); end; //--------------------------------------------Clear Shortcut procedure c; begin ClearDebug end; //--------------------------------------------Activate client procedure clientfind; begin FindClient := 0; if(FindClient = 0)then ActivateClient c; FindClient := 1; Writeln ('Client Identified') end; //--------------------------------------------Initiate begin clientfind; process; //track; end.
The findcolortolerance in that script gives me the errors. I don’t know what I’m doing wrong.
Someone help me
Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a bit of help with FindColorTolerance
